title: I made a chibi Ahri!
body:
http://stacona.deviantart.com/art/Chibi-Ahri-League-of-Legends-512182613

Here is my deviant art for those interested: http://stacona.deviantart.com/

replies.body:
Omg she's adorable! Just watched you on dA. :)
I made a chibi mummy haha. Currently working on a chibi Lux.
really cute, but i dont understand the dynamics of her legs, they are back or ahead, she is on knees or sitting, why the dress seems to be ahead? :3
legs bend, but yea it is hard performing poses - especially uncommon poses- also Ahri's dress/skirt is not that long
